item.title: About
item.description: I am an undergraduate student at Smith College double majoring in Statistical and Data Sciences & Mathematics expected to graduate in May 2022. As an R enthusiast, I am the co-author of the fec16 R package which is in the process of being released on CRAN. This summer, I am working with Professor Albert Kim on improving the fivethirtyeight R package and ModernDive book. I serve as the Data Ambassador of Smithies in Statistical and Data Sciences, a student run orgranization spreading the love of data science.
